LoanApplicationAsset.name: LoanApplicationAsset
LoanApplicationAsset.description: Represents details about the borrower's and co-borrower's current personal and real property.

AccountNumber.description: Account number associated with financial institution holding asset.

AssetClass.description: Identifies which asset class total to include the asset's value in.

AssetExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

CashOrMarketValue.description: Asset's cash or current market value.

DispositionType.description: Real estate asset's planned future use.

FinancialInstitutionName.description: Name of financial institution where financial account is held.

GrossMonthlyRentalIncome.description: Borrower's monthly rent income collected on real estate asset.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicationId.description: ID of the loan application associated with this asset.

Name.description: Name of the loan application asset.

NetMonthlyRentalIncome.description: Borrower's net monthly income on real estate asset.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

PresentMarketValue.description: Cash value of real estate asset if sold today.

RealEstateGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

RealEstateLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

RealEstateLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

RealEstateMonthlyExpense.description: Borrower's monthly real estate asset expenses including insurance, maintenance, taxes, and miscellaneous costs.
